titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 4637) making appropriations for foreign operations, export financing, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1989, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-648.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 246 - 154 (Record Vote No: 153).

bill.summary: 5/24/1988--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 4637 (foreign operations and related programs funding).
